reviewText: good collection of old hero movies.
Cute box set.  Ok for kids.

This is a 4 disc set that contains: Disc 1 Son of Samson/Son of Cleopatra Disc 2 Hero of Rome/Invincible Gladiator Disc 3 War Gods of Babylon & War Goddess Disc 4 The Magic Voyage Of Sinbad / The Day The Earth Froze (Fans of Mystery Science Theater 3000 may recognize the last two as riffing classics.) The price of this collection alone makes this a fantastic deal! You may also like: Warriors 50 Movie Pack Collection
